page.title: 03RELIGION IN MADDERTY
page.content: { ABBEY CHURCH} There is only one church in Madderty. This is a Presbyterian Church of Scotland with a congregation of 129. The minister is Rev.J.Leckie. The church is linked with Fowlis Wester and Monzie. The minister conducts a service in two of the three churches on Sunday morning. A relief minister takes the service in the third church. Madderty church service is at 10am. There is a Sunday school with five children in the care of Mrs. Lyall. There is a Women's Guild which meets in the village hall.
